text:
How to we render the videos in a react component which is connected to a `<VideoField>`?
The purpose is to collected all video analytics in HubSpot just like we do in `hubl` <@UAYBXDG4U> <@UCY83QS6Q>

Hello

While we don't provide a built in component yet, a solution can be found here:

<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C04AY1H2204/p1721953438640309>
